articles.summary: 'Cosi fan tutte' was the last of three collaborations between Mozart and librettist Lorenzo Da Ponte. In the opera, Don Alfonso bets two young friends that their girlfriends will be unfaithful. Yuval Sharon's production turns Alfonso into the head of an AI company called SoulSync.

articles.title: Businesses are increasingly turning to AI to ensure accessibility for people with disabilities. Is it working? - Shelbyville Times-Gazette
articles.author: Kathleen Caulderwood
articles.summary: An estimated 1.3 billion people worldwide experience significant disabilities. AI-powered tools are becoming essential for creating more accessible workplaces. Many of these innovations are helping companies meet the standards of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990. However, the rapid rise of AI has presented challenges, as many AI tools are far from perfect.

articles.title: Pondering on Artificial Intelligence
articles.author: The Nugget Newspaper
articles.summary: As a writer, the idea of AI has been unsettling to him. Most of his novels have been absorbed into AI's vast system for 'teaching purposes'. According to some articles, AI has infiltrated into today's journalism. AI will be smarter than all of us as soon as 2029 according to some predictions.
